title: E-Root admin faces 20 years for selling stolen RDP, SSH accounts
description: Sandu Diaconu, the operator of the E-Root marketplace, has been extradited to the U.S. to face a maximum imprisonment penalty of 20 years for selling access to compromised computers. [...]

title: BlackCat ransomware uses new ‘Munchkin’ Linux VM in stealthy attacks
description: The BlackCat/ALPHV ransomware operation has begun to use a new tool named 'Munchkin' that utilizes virtual machines to deploy encryptors on network devices stealthily. [...]

title: Microsoft extends Purview Audit log retention after July breach
description: Microsoft is extending Purview Audit log retention as promised after the Chinese Storm-0558 hacking group breached dozens of Exchange and Microsoft 365 corporate and government accounts in July. [...]

title: Fake KeePass site uses Google Ads and Punycode to push malware
description: A Google Ads campaign was found pushing a fake KeePass download site that used Punycode to appear as the official domain of the KeePass password manager to distribute malware. [...]

title: India targets Microsoft, Amazon tech support scammers in nationwide crackdown
description: India's Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) raided 76 locations in a nationwide crackdown on cybercrime operations behind tech support scams and cryptocurrency fraud. [...]

title: Iranian hackers lurked in Middle Eastern govt network for 8 months
description: The Iranian hacking group tracked as MuddyWater (aka APT34 or OilRig) breached at least twelve computers belonging to a Middle Eastern government network and maintained access for eight months between February and September 2023. [...]

title: Ragnar Locker ransomware’s dark web extortion sites seized by police
description: The Ragnar Locker ransomware operation's Tor negotiation and data leak sites were seized Thursday morning as part of an international law enforcement operation. [...]

title: WhatsApp gets support for multiple accounts on the same phone
description: Meta announced today that it's rolling out support for multiple WhatsApp accounts on the same device, allowing users to switch between them without needing to log out. [...]

title: Casio discloses data breach impacting customers in 149 countries
description: Japanese electronics manufacturer Casio disclosed a data breach impacting customers from 149 countries after hackers gained to the servers of its ClassPad education platform. [...]
